timeFrame.title: Time Frame
timeFrame.label: Number of Years
timeFrame.explanation: How many years you want to calculate your budget for. Keep in mind that the [X] years of expenses in each card stay the same if this value is changed.

financialInputs.explanationYearlyIncome: Your total annual income before taxes and deductions. Used to calculate your starting tax bracket
financialInputs.explanationBtcPurchasePrice: The price you bought your BTC at. Used to calculate your capital gains tax
financialInputs.explanationBtcSalePrice: The price you plan to sell your BTC at. Used to calculate your capital gains tax
financialInputs.explanationLoanAmount: The amount of money you plan to loan or get by other means than selling BTC. This amount will be subtracted from the total amount you need to sell in BTC

summary.title: Summary
summary.explanationTaxesFromSelling: Calculated by adding up capital gains tax and municipal tax from selling BTC
summary.explanationGains: The total profit from selling Bitcoin, calculated as the difference between the sale price and purchase price multiplied by the amount of Bitcoin sold.

bitcoinInfo.title: Bitcoin Calculations
bitcoinInfo.btcForExpenses: BTC needed for {{timeFrame}} years of expenses (after loan):
bitcoinInfo.btcForTaxes: BTC needed to pay for taxes:

taxBreakdown.title: Tax Breakdown
taxBreakdown.explanationStartingBracket: Based on yearly income. Taxes paid for yearly income are assumed to be automatically deducted from your salary and are not included in this calculation.
taxBreakdown.noData: Not enough data to calculate tax breakdown. Please enter all required information.
taxBreakdown.explanationYearlyIncomeTax: This is an estimate of the tax on your yearly income. It's likely that this amount is already being deducted from your salary. The additional taxes calculated above are specifically for your Bitcoin gains and will be reassessed during your tax return.
taxBreakdown.explanationDeduction: This is a fixed amount subtracted from the tax calculation based on your income bracket. It helps to reduce the overall tax burden.

deleteExpense.title: Delete Expense
deleteExpense.description: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.
